headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: advertiser_id
parameters.description: Advertiser ID.

parameters.name: adgroup_id
parameters.description: Ad group ID.

parameters.name: patch_update
parameters.description: Whether to use incremental update mode. The following fields are supported when you set this field to true : ad_name identity_id identity_type identity_authorized_bc_id video_id image_ids music_id tiktok_item_id ad_text ad_texts For example, to update the ad name by using incremental update mode, configure the following settings only: Set patch_update to true . Set ad_name to the new ad name. Pass the required fields, including the Header parameters, advertiser_id , and ad_id . Important : If you choose to enable the incremental update mode by passing this field, we recommend thoroughly testing to prevent any disruptions to your current ad update workflow.

parameters.name: creatives
parameters.description: Advertising creatives. Max size: 20.

parameters.name: ad_id
parameters.description: Ad ID.

parameters.name: ad_name Conditional
parameters.description: Required only when patch_update is not set to true . Ad name. To make the ad name automatically generated, set this field to "" (empty string). The format of the auto-generated ad name is ad ID ( ad_id ). Length limit: 512 and cannot contain emojis. Note : Each word in Chinese or Japanese counts as two characters, while each letter in English counts as one character.

parameters.name: identity_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required only when patch_update is not set to true . Identity ID. If you are not using Spark Ads, identity_id and identity_type ( CUSTOMIZED_USER ) can be used for better management of ads information. Note : An identity of the identity type AUTH_CODE , TT_USER , or BC_AUTH_TT can only be used to create a maximum of 10,000 ads. If you reach this limit, you can release the ad quota associated with that identity by deleting the ads where it is used. To check the remaining ad quota for such an identity, you can call /asset/bind/quota/ and examine the value returned for available_quota .

parameters.name: identity_type Conditional
parameters.description: Required only when patch_update is not set to true and you use Spark Ads. Identity type. Enum values: CUSTOMIZED_USER , AUTH_CODE , TT_USER , BC_AUTH_TT . For details about identities, see Identities . Note : An identity of the identity type AUTH_CODE , TT_USER , or BC_AUTH_TT can only be used to create a maximum of 10,000 ads. If you reach this limit, you can release the ad quota associated with that identity by deleting the ads where it is used. To check the remaining ad quota for such an identity, you can call /asset/bind/quota/ and examine the value returned for available_quota .

parameters.name: identity_authorized_bc_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when identity_type is BC_AUTH_TT . ID of the Business Center that a TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with.

parameters.name: product_specific_type
parameters.description: Valid only when shopping_ads_type is VIDEO and product_source is CATALOG . Different dimensions to choose products. Use this field to modify the product selection dimension for the Video Shopping Ad with product source as catalog (VSA for Catalog). Enum values: ALL : Allow TikTok to dynamically choose from all products. If this field is set to ALL , you don't need to input sku_ids , item_group_ids and product_set_id . PRODUCT_SET : Specify a product set. TikTok will dynamically choose products from this set. If this field is set to PRODUCT_SET , you need to pass in either item_group_ids or product_set_id . CUSTOMIZED_PRODUCTS : Specify a customized number of products. If this field is set to CUSTOMIZED_PRODUCTS , sku_ids is required.

parameters.name: item_group_ids Conditional
parameters.description: If product_specific_type is set to PRODUCT_SET , you need to pass in either item_group_ids or product_set_id . Product SPU IDs. The products should belong to the same catalog ( catalog_id ) specified at the ad group level. Use either item_group_ids or product_set_id to modify the product set used in the VSA for Catalog. Max size: 20.

parameters.name: product_set_id Conditional
parameters.description: If product_specific_type is set to PRODUCT_SET , you need to pass in either item_group_ids or product_set_id . The ID of the product set. The product set should consist of products that belong to the same catalog ( catalog_id ) specified at the ad group level. Use either item_group_ids or product_set_id to modify the product set used in the VSA for Catalog.

parameters.name: sku_ids Conditional
parameters.description: Required when product_specific_type is CUSTOMIZED_PRODUCTS . IDs of the SKUs (Stock Keeping Units). The products should belong to the same catalog ( catalog_id ) specified at the ad group level. Use this field to modify the specific products within a Video Shopping Ad with product source as catalog. Max size: 20. Note : You cannot update this field to an empty list or null value. Only available products in a catalog are supported. To get available products from a catalog, use /catalog/product/get/ . Select the products with ad_creation_eligible as AVAILABLE . If the ad is a VSA Carousel Ad ( ad_format is CATALOG_CAROUSEL ), ensure that at least two products are specified.

parameters.name: ad_format Conditional
parameters.description: Required only when patch_update is not set to true . The ad format. Enum values: SINGLE_IMAGE , SINGLE_VIDEO , LIVE_CONTENT , CAROUSEL_ADS , CATALOG_CAROUSEL . For single video ads, set this field to SINGLE_VIDEO . For single image ads, set this field to SINGLE_IMAGE . For TikTok Standard Carousel ads, set this field to CAROUSEL_ADS . For TikTok VSA Carousel ads, Automotive Carousel Ads for Inventory , or Automotive Carousel Ads for Models , set this field to CATALOG_CAROUSEL . See here to learn about the steps of creating TikTok Carousel Ads. For Live Shopping Ads, set this field to LIVE_CONTENT . Note : If you have set this field to CAROUSEL_ADS or CATALOG_CAROUSEL during ad creation, you cannot update this field.

parameters.name: vertical_video_strategy
parameters.description: The video type that you use for Product Sales scenarios. Enum values: UNSET (unset), SINGLE_VIDEO (single video), CATALOG_VIDEOS (catalog video using video templates), CATALOG_UPLOADED_VIDEOS (catalog video using uploaded videos), LIVE_STREAM (livestream video). It must be UNSET if dynamic_format = DYNAMIC_CREATIVE . Note : If you have specified a value for the field during ad creation, you need to pass the same value and cannot update this field to a different value.

parameters.name: dynamic_format
parameters.description: Dynamic format. Enum values: UNSET : Unset. DYNAMIC_CREATIVE : smart creative. To display different videos, product cards and destinations to each person based on purchase intent, maximizing conversions.

parameters.name: video_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when ad_format is SINGLE_VIDEO and identity_type is CUSTOMIZED_USER . When ad_format is SINGLE_VIDEO and identity_type is TT_USER or BC_AUTH_TT , you need to pass either video_id or tiktok_item_id . Not supported when ad_format is SINGLE_IMAGE or CAROUSEL_ADS . Video ID. To obtain video IDs, use /file/video/ad/search/ . If you want to create Spark Ads, you can use video_id or tiktok_item_id . To learn more about Spark Ads, see Create Spark Ads . Note : To ensure a smooth integration journey, we recommend that you use /file/video/ad/upload/ ( upload_type = UPLOAD_BY_VIDEO_ID ) to bind video ID with your advertiser ID.

parameters.name: image_ids Conditional
parameters.description: A list of image IDs (images used in an ad or as a video cover). To obtain the image ID, use the /file/image/ad/search/ or /file/image/ad/upload/ endpoint. When ad_format is SINGLE_VIDEO : If you want to create video Spark Ads via Spark Ads Push or create video Non-Spark Ads, this field is required and the value of this field will be used as the video cover (thumbnail) (only one value is allowed), and the aspect ratio of the image should be the same as the video. If you want to create video Spark Ads via Spark Ads Pull, this field is not supported. You need to pass tiktok_item_id instead. When ad_format is set to CAROUSEL_ADS : If you want to create Standard Carousel Spark Ads via Spark Ads Push or create Standard Carousel Non-Spark Ads, this field is required and the size range for this field is [1, 35], and the sequence of the image IDs specified via this field is the order in which the images are shown in the Standard Carousel Ads. See Create Carousel Ads-Steps-Create an ad to learn about the requirements for images that can be used in TikTok Standard Carousel Ads. If you want to create Standard Carousel Spark Ads via Spark Ads Pull, this field is not supported. You need to pass tiktok_item_id instead. When ad_format is set to CATALOG_CAROUSEL at the ad level and catalog_enabled is set to true at the campaign level, this field is required and the value of this field will be used as the summary photo in the Automotive Ad for Inventory or Automotive Ad for Models (only one value is allowed). See Create Automotive Ads for Inventory or Automotive Ads for Models to learn about the requirements for the summary photo that can be used in Automotive Ads for Inventory or Automotive Ads for Models. When ad_format is set to SINGLE_IMAGE , this field is required and you can only assign one image ID to this field. To learn about the requirements for images that can be used in single image ads, see Create single image ads . Note : If you change the image IDs specified for a TikTok Carousel Ad via this field, the ad will go into the review process again.

parameters.name: carousel_image_index
parameters.description: Valid for VSA Carousel ads where a list of additional images has been configured for the specified products. Not supported for Automotive Carousel Ads for Inventory or Automotive Carousel Ads for Models . The index that specifies the additional images to be used in the VSA Carousel ad. If this field is not passed, the main images of catalog products will be used in the VSA Carousel ad. Value range: [0, 9]. The number you set via this field represents the position of the product image within the additional image list ( additional_image_urls ) for each E-commerce catalog product. For instance, carousel_image_index = 1 means that you will use all the images specified via the second image URL in each additional_image_urls value as images in the Carousel Ad. You can retrieve the additional images configured for a product via additional_image_urls returned by /catalog/product/get/ . If you specify the additional image index using this field, the system will count the number of E-commerce products with available additional images. If the index you provide does not match any of the additional image URLs specified for the product or if the additional image fails to be fetched from the corresponding image URL, the product will not be counted. When there are two or more products with available additional images, only those products will be displayed in the ads with the additional images used. When there are fewer than two products with available additional images, all products will be displayed in the ads with the main images used.

parameters.name: end_card_cta
parameters.description: Valid when the following conditions are met: At the campaign level: objective_type is LEAD_GENERATION . catalog_enabled is true . At the ad group level: An Auto-Inventory or Auto-Model catalog is specified through catalog_id . At the ad level: ad_format is CATALOG_CAROUSEL . Call-to-action for the end card ( image_ids ) of an Automotive Carousel Ad for Inventory or Automotive Carousel Ads for Models . Enum values: SEARCH_INVENTORY (Recommended): Search inventory. LEARN_MORE : Learn more. SHOP_NOW : Shop now. SIGN_UP : Sign up. CONTACT_US : Contact us. BOOK_NOW : Book now. READ_MORE : Read more. VIEW_MORE : View now. ORDER_NOW : Order now.

parameters.name: music_id
parameters.description: Valid in any of the following scenarios: ad_format is CAROUSEL_ADS and you want to create Standard Carousel Spark Ads via Spark Ads Push or Standard Carousel Non-Spark Ads. ad_format is CATALOG_CAROUSEL . The ID of the piece of music that you want to use in the TikTok Carousel Ad. See Create Carousel Ads-Steps-Create an ad to learn about how to get music that can be used in TikTok Carousel Ads. Note : If you specify via this field a music ID that is different from the music ID used in an existing TikTok Carousel Ad, the ad will go into the review process again.

parameters.name: tiktok_item_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when identity_type is AUTH_CODE , or BC_AUTH_TT . and you want to create Spark Ads through Spark Ads Pull. Not supported when identity_type is CUSTOMIZED_USER . The ID of the TikTok post to be used as Spark Ad. To learn more about Spark Ads, see Create Spark Ads . Pass in the tiktok_item_id you get from the response of the /tt_video/info/ endpoint. Note : By using Spark Ads, you confirm that you have the rights to use the music in the videos for commercial purposes.

parameters.name: promotional_music_disabled
parameters.description: Whether to disable the promotional use of the music in the Spark Ad. The default value is true . If you want to allow dueting and stitching for the TikTok video, you need to set this field to false . This field is only valid for Spark Ad posts.

parameters.name: item_duet_status
parameters.description: Whether to enable dueting for the Spark Ad. This field is valid only when promotional_music_disabled is set to false . Enum values: ENABLE , DISABLE . This field is only valid for Spark Ad posts.

parameters.name: item_stitch_status
parameters.description: Whether to enable stitching for the Spark Ad. This field is valid only when promotional_music_disabled is set to false . Enum values: ENABLE , DISABLE . This field is only valid for Spark Ad posts.

parameters.name: dark_post_status
parameters.description: You can set this field to either ON or OFF. Default value: OFF . If the ad is created as a dark post, it will not appear in the creator's homepage

parameters.name: shopping_ads_video_package_id
parameters.description: Product video package ID. Use the /catalog/video/get/ endpoint to get video package IDs.

parameters.name: ad_text Conditional
parameters.description: For Spark Ads Push , ad_text is required. For non-Spark Ads , either ad_text or ad_texts has to be set. An ad text. It is shown to your audience as part of your ad creative, to deliver the message you intend to communicate to them. If you don't know how to create effective ad texts, you can try the Smart Text feature, which generates ad text recommendations based on the industry and language. Length limit for the ad text: 100 characters long and cannot contain emoji. Each word in Chinese or Japanese counts as two characters, while each letter in English counts as one character. Note : If both ad_text and ad_texts are specified, ad_text will be ignored.

parameters.name: ad_texts Conditional
parameters.description: For non-Spark Ads, either ad_text or ad_texts has to be set. Valid only for Search Ads Campaigns . A list of ad texts. The ad text is shown to your audience as part of your ad creative, to deliver the message that you intend to communicate to them. When you specify multiple ad texts, the system will automatically select the most relevant to the audience and optimize for the best results. If you don't know how to create effective ad texts, you can try the Smart Text feature, which generates ad text recommendations based on industry and language. Size limit: 5. Length limit for each ad text: 100 characters long and cannot contain emoji. Each word in Chinese or Japanese counts as two characters, while each letter in English counts as one character. Note : If both ad_text and ad_texts are specified, ad_text will be ignored.

parameters.name: call_to_action Conditional
parameters.description: Call-to-action text. For TikTok ads, either this field or call_to_action_id must be specified. If both are specified, this field will be ignored. For enum values, see Enumeration - Call-to-Action . In a Live Shopping Ad where creative_type is set to SHORT_VIDEO_LIVE , this field is required and must be set to WATCH_LIVE .

parameters.name: call_to_action_id Conditional
parameters.description: The ID of the CTA portfolio that you want to use in your ads. A CTA portfolio is a group of auto-optimized CTAs. If both this field and call_to_action are specified, call_to_action will be ignored. For details about auto-optimized CTAs, see CTA recommendations > Dynamic CTAs .

parameters.name: card_id
parameters.description: Creative portfolio ID. Pass the ID of one of the following creative portfolio types: call-to-action text. Website info card. Display Card. Download Card. Product Card. Product Tiles. Countdown Sticker. Gift Code Sticker. Pop-up Showcase. Gesture. Superlike. To create a creative portfolio, use /creative/portfolio/create/ . To learn about how to get the ID of a Display Card, Website info card, Download Card, Product Card, or Product Tiles portfolio, see Cards . To learn about how to get the ID of a Countdown Sticker or Giftcode Sticker portfolio, see Stickers . To learn about how to get the ID of a Pop-out Showcase, Gesture, or Superlike portfolio, see Premium Add-ons . Note : To delete the creative portfolio used in the VSA for Catalog, omit this field. The value of card_id will be set to null in the response. However, note that if dynamic format is enabled for the ad and card_id is not included in your request to /ad/update/ , the creative portfolio will not be deleted. This is because for ads using dynamic format, the product card will be automatically generated.

parameters.name: landing_page_url Conditional
parameters.description: Landing page URL. The landing page URL can include URL parameters that are appended to the end of the URL. To learn more about URL parameters, see the description of the parameter utm_params . Example: https://www.example.com?utm_source=TikTok&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=Campaign1&utm_content=Content1

parameters.name: utm_params
parameters.description: This field is supported in any of the following scenarios: Video Shopping Ads (VSA) for Catalog scenarios: At the campaign level: objective_type is set to PRODUCT_SALES At the ad group level: shopping_ads_type is set to VIDEO (Video Shopping Ads) product_source is set to CATALOG promotion_type is set to WEBSITE , APP_ANDROID , or APP_IOS Automotive Ads for Inventory (AIA) or Automotive Ads for Models scenarios: At the campaign level: objective_type is set to LEAD_GENERATION catalog_enabled is set to true At the ad group level: promotion_target_type is set to EXTERNAL_WEBSITE Other scenarios: At the campaign level: objective_type is set to REACH , TRAFFIC , VIDEO_VIEWS , LEAD_GENERATION (with catalog_enabled as false ), ENGAGEMENT , APP_PROMOTION (with app_promotion_type as APP_PREREGISTRATION ), WEB_CONVERSIONS , or RF_REACH . A list of URL parameters. URL parameters are snippets of code that can be added to the end of the URLs to help you track clicks across different channels and understand how visitors interact with a website through third-party analytics platforms. They consist of key-value pairs that are specified through key and value . Max size : 14. In VSA for Catalog scenarios: If you use a product link in your ad ( shopping_ads_fallback_type is SHOPPING_ADS ), you can add URL parameters to the product link by passing utm_params . The URL parameters will be automatically appended to the product link upon ad delivery. If you use a custom link (website URL) in your ad ( shopping_ads_fallback_type is CUSTOM ), you can manually add URL parameters to the custom link by directly setting landing_page_url to a URL that already includes URL parameters. However, if you use a custom link in your ad and pass utm_params at the same time, the URL parameters will not be automatically appended to the custom link ( landing_page_url ) upon ad delivery. In such cases, you need to ensure that you specify a landing_page_url with the URL parameters already appended, and that utm_params exactly matches the used URL parameters. Otherwise, an error will occur. In AIA or Automotive Ads for Models scenarios, you can add URL parameters to the product link (the landing_page_url of your catalog products) by passing utm_params . The URL parameters will be automatically appended to the product link upon ad delivery. In other scenarios, if you set landing_page_url to a URL that already includes URL parameters, you can optionally pass utm_params at the same time to store the URL parameters used in the URL. In such cases, you need to ensure that utm_params exactly matches the used URL parameters. The URL parameters will not be automatically appended to the landing_page_url upon ad delivery.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The URL parameter. You can specify a custom parameter or a UTM parameter. The supported UTM parameters are: utm_source : The app, site, etc., that brings traffic to your website. For example: TikTok. utm_medium : The advertising or marketing medium. For example: cpm, cpc, banner, video. utm_content : The creative content used for promotion. For example: ad name, CTA text, asset, color, etc. utm_campaign : The individual campaign name, slogan, or promo code. For example: BlackFridayProm. Note that UTM parameters are case-sensitive. Length limit when you specify a custom parameter: 100 characters.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value of the URL parameter. You can specify a custom value or the name of a macro. The supported macros are: __CAMPAIGN_NAME__ : This will be replaced by your campaign name. __CAMPAIGN_ID__ : This will be replaced by your campaign ID. __AID_NAME__ : This will be replaced by your ad group name. __AID__ : This will be replaced by your ad group ID. __CID_NAME__ : This will be replaced by your ad name. __CID__ : This will be replaced by your ad ID. __PLACEMENT__ : This will be replaced by your placement. Length limit when you specify a custom value: 600 characters.

parameters.name: page_id Conditional
parameters.description: Page ID. To obtain pages within your ad account, use /page/get/ . To create instant pages, use Instant Page Editor SDK . Instant forms are for LEAD_GENERATION campaign objective. Only applicable for TikTok placement. Before creating for the first time, you need to sign the LeadAds agreement through the /term/confirm/ endpoint.

parameters.name: cpp_url
parameters.description: The Custom Product Page (CPP) URL. CPPs are product pages with customized screenshots, promotional text, and app previews that can be used to highlight specific content or features of the promoted app, or reach specific audiences. The Custom Product Page URL must be consistent with the promoted app ( app_id ). Format: https://apps.apple.com/{region}/app/{app_name}/id{app_id}?ppid={ppid} . Length limit: 512 characters. Example: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/tiktok/id835599320?ppid=12345a6b-c789-12d3-e4f5-g6h78i91jk2l . To learn about the scenarios where you can use CPPs in your ads and the detailed steps, see Custom Product Pages . Note : Using Custom Product Pages in ads is currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative. If you use App Profile Page ( page_id ) along with CPP URL ( cpp_url ) in your ads and update the CPP URL, the App Profile Page will not be automatically updated. To maintain consistency with the CPP, you will need to manually update the product information on the App Profile Page.

parameters.name: deeplink
parameters.description: The specific location where you want your audience to go if they have your app installed. See deeplink_type for more. To learn about the supported scenarios for non-deferred deeplinks and deferred deeplinks, see the " Deeplink - Availability - Deeplink " section. Note : Deferred deeplinks are currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative. Note that implementing deferred deeplinks require technical resources and development capabilities. Non-deferred deeplinks are currently an allowlist-only feature for some scenarios. To check the scenarios where non-deferred deeplinks are an allowlist-only feature, see the " Deeplink - Availability - Deeplink " section. If you would like to access it for these scenarios, please contact your TikTok representative.

parameters.name: deeplink_type
parameters.description: The deeplink type. Enum values: NORMAL : non-deferred deeplink. DEFERRED_DEEPLINK : deferred deeplink. Default value: NORMAL . To learn about the supported scenarios for non-deferred deeplinks and deferred deeplinks, see the " Deeplink - Availability - Deeplink " section. Note : Deferred deeplinks are currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative. Note that implementing deferred deeplinks require technical resources and development capabilities. Non-deferred deeplinks are currently an allowlist-only feature for some scenarios. To check the scenarios where non-deferred deeplinks are an allowlist-only feature, see the " Deeplink - Availability - Deeplink " section. If you would like to access it for these scenarios, please contact your TikTok representative. Deferred deeplinks are not supported in Dedicated Campaigns. Therefore, if the campaign_type of the campaign that the ad belongs to is IOS14_CAMPAIGN , you cannot set this field to DEFERRED_DEEPLINK .

parameters.name: shopping_ads_deeplink_type
parameters.description: The source of the deeplink to be used in the Shopping Ads. Enum values: NONE : No deeplink. CUSTOM : Custom deeplink. Use the deeplink you provided in the ad. You need to specify deeplink at the same time. SHOPPING_ADS : Product deeplink. Use the deeplink you've provided for each product in the catalog. The SHOPPING_ADS value is not supported when the following conditions are met: At the ad group level: shopping_ads_type is set to VIDEO (Video Shopping Ads) And product_source is set to CATALOG At the ad level: ad_format is set to SINGLE_VIDEO and vertical_video_strategy is set to SINGLE_VIDEO Or ad_format is set to CATALOG_CAROUSEL To learn about the supported scenarios for non-deferred deeplinks and deferred deeplinks, see the " Deeplink - Availability - Deeplink " section. Note : Deferred deeplinks are currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative. Note that implementing deferred deeplinks require technical resources and development capabilities. Non-deferred deeplinks are currently an allowlist-only feature for some scenarios. To check the scenarios where non-deferred deeplinks are an allowlist-only feature, see the " Deeplink - Availability - Deeplink " section. If you would like to access it for these scenarios, please contact your TikTok representative.

parameters.name: deeplink_utm_params
parameters.description: This field is supported only when the following conditions are all met: At the ad group level: shopping_ads_type is set to VIDEO (Video Shopping Ads) product_source is set to CATALOG promotion_type is set to WEBSITE , APP_ANDROID , or APP_IOS A list of deeplink URL parameters. URL parameters are snippets of code that can be added to the end of the URLs to help you track clicks across different channels and understand how visitors interact with a website through third-party analytics platforms. They consist of key-value pairs that are specified through key and value . Max size: 14. If you use a product deeplink in your ad ( shopping_ads_deeplink_type is SHOPPING_ADS ), you can add deeplink URL parameters to the product deeplink by passing deeplink_utm_params . The URL parameters will be automatically appended to the product link upon ad delivery. If you use a custom deeplink in your ad ( shopping_ads_deeplink_type = CUSTOM ), you can manually add deeplink URL parameters to the custom deeplink by directly setting deeplink to a deeplink that already includes URL parameters. However, if you use a custom deeplink in your ad and pass deeplink_utm_params at the same time, the URL parameters will not be automatically appended to the custom deeplink ( deeplink ) upon ad delivery. In such cases, you need to ensure that deeplink_utm_params exactly matches the used deeplink URL parameters. Note : Deeplink URL parameters are currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The deeplink URL parameter. You can specify a custom parameter or a UTM parameter. The supported UTM parameters are: utm_source : The app, site, etc., that brings traffic to your website. For example: TikTok. utm_medium : The advertising or marketing medium. For example: cpm, cpc, banner, video. utm_content : The creative content used for promotion. For example: ad name, CTA text, asset, color, etc. utm_campaign : The individual campaign name, slogan, or promo code. For example: BlackFridayProm. Note that UTM parameters are case-sensitive. Length limit when you specify a custom parameter: 100 characters.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value of the deeplink URL parameter. You can specify a custom value or the name of a macro. The supported macros are: __CAMPAIGN_NAME__ : This will be replaced by your campaign name. __CAMPAIGN_ID__ : This will be replaced by your campaign ID. __AID_NAME__ : This will be replaced by your ad group name. __AID__ : This will be replaced by your ad group ID. __CID_NAME__ : This will be replaced by your ad name. __CID__ : This will be replaced by your ad ID. __PLACEMENT__ : This will be replaced by your placement. Length limit when you specify a custom value: 600 characters.

parameters.name: shopping_ads_fallback_type Conditional
parameters.description: In the Shopping Ads retargeting scenario, the fallback website type when the deeplink fails to be triggered. Enum values: DEFAULT : Unset. CUSTOM : Custom link. Fall back to the web page link you provide. You need to pass in landing_page_url at the same time. SHOPPING_ADS : Product link. Fall back to the web page link you've provided for each product in the catalog. The SHOPPING_ADS value is not supported when the following conditions are met: At the ad group level: shopping_ads_type is set to VIDEO (Video Shopping Ads) And product_source is set to CATALOG At the ad level: ad_format is set to SINGLE_VIDEO and vertical_video_strategy is set to SINGLE_VIDEO Or ad_format is set to CATALOG_CAROUSEL To learn about the supported scenarios for fallback types, see the " Deeplink - Availability - Fallback type " section.

parameters.name: fallback_type
parameters.description: Fallback Type. If the audience do not have the app installed, you can have them fall back to install the app, or to view a specific web page. Enum values: APP_INSTALL : the App Store or Google Play page for the promoted App that is specified through the app_id field at the ad group level. WEBSITE : the promoted web page that is specified through landing_page_url . UNSET : Unset. If you set this field to WEBSITE , you need to pass the landing_page_url field. To learn about the supported scenarios for fallback types, see the " Deeplink - Availability - Fallback type " section.

parameters.name: dynamic_destination
parameters.description: Valid only when the following conditions are met: At the ad group level: shopping_ads_type is set to VIDEO (Video Shopping Ads). product_source is set to CATALOG . promotion_type is set to WEBSITE . optimization_goal is set to CONVERSION or VALUE . Dynamic destination strategy. Use this field to modify the dynamic destination strategy for the VSA for Catalog. Enum values: DLP : Dynamic Landing Page. Displaying different destinations including a custom website or Instant Product Page to each person based on their profile, behavior, and intent to maximize ad conversion. UNSET : Unset.

parameters.name: instant_product_page_used
parameters.description: Whether to use TikTok Instant Product Page, an auto-generated TikTok instant page that displays a range of products and provides a native experience landing page. When dynamic_destination = DLP , you don't need this parameter. When dynamic_destination = UNSET , you can set this field to true , and you don't need to pass in page_id .

parameters.name: page_image_index
parameters.description: Valid only when you set instant_product_page_used to true , and a list of additional images has been configured for the specified products. The index that specifies the additional images to be used on the TikTok Instant Product Page. If this field is not passed, the main images of catalog products will be used on the TikTok Instant Product Page. Value range: [0, 9]. The number you set via this field represents the position of the product image within the additional image list ( additional_image_urls ) for each catalog product. For instance, page_image_index = 1 means that you will use all the images specified via the second image URL in each additional_image_urls value as images on the TikTok Instant Product Page. You can retrieve the additional images configured for a product via additional_image_urls returned by /catalog/product/get/ . If you set a number greater than the total number of additional Image URLs specified for the product, this field will be ignored, and the main image ( image_url ) for the product will be used. You can retrieve the main image for a product via image_url returned by /catalog/product/get/ .

parameters.name: aigc_disclosure_type
parameters.description: Valid only when identity_type is CUSTOMIZED_USER . Whether to turn on the AIGC (Artificial Intelligence Generated Content) self-disclosure toggle to indicate the ad contains AI-generated content. After the toggle is turned on, your ad will carry an "Advertiser labeled as Al-generated" label when viewed in full. Enum values: SELF_DISCLOSURE : To turn on the toggle to declare that the ad contains AI-generated content. NOT_DECLARED : To not declare that the ad contains AI-generated content. Default value: NOT_DECLARED . To learn about the supported advertising objectives and ad formats for the toggle and the detailed steps for using the toggle, see AIGC self-disclosure toggle . Note : For Single Video or Carousel Ads, you can only update this field when you update the ad creative (video or image) itself. For example, if you only reorder the images in a Carousel Ad, this field cannot be updated. For Dynamic Format, Catalog Video, and Catalog Carousel Ads, this field cannot be updated.

parameters.name: disclaimer_type
parameters.description: Type of disclaimer that you want to add to the ad. Enum values: TEXT_LINK (clickable disclaimers), TEXT_ONLY (text-only disclaimers). See Include disclaimers in ads to learn about how to configure disclaimer settings. Note : If you want to add a disclaimer to an ad with no disclaimer, you can use this field to set the disclaimer type. For ads with disclaimers, you can only update the text or url or both for the disclaimer. You cannot use this field to change the disclaimer type and you need to pass in the same disclaimer type. Disclaimers are currently an allowlist-only feature for advertisers not registered in Canada and America using auction ad objectives, and for all advertisers using Reach & Frequency ad objectives. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative. The disclaimer feature only supports the following advertising objectives: APP_PROMOTION , WEB_CONVERSIONS , REACH , TRAFFIC , VIDEO_VIEWS , ENGAGEMENT , LEAD_GENERATION , RF_REACH . The disclaimer feature only supports TikTok placement. The disclaimer feature is not supported for Automated Creative Optimization ads.

parameters.name: disclaimer_text Conditional
parameters.description: The text-only disclaimer that you want to add to the ad. Required when disclaimer_type = TEXT_ONLY .

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The disclaimer text. Length limit: 90 characters.

parameters.name: disclaimer_clickable_texts Conditional
parameters.description: The clickable disclaimer or clickable disclaimers that you want to add to the ad. Required when disclaimer_type = TEXT_LINK . Max size: 3. If you use multiple clickable disclaimers, both the overall length for all the texts you pass in and the length of individual text need to be no more than 40 characters.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The disclaimer text. Length limit: 40 characters.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL for the clickable disclaimer. When users tap each text, they will be redirected to the URL and see more disclaimer details.

parameters.name: tracking_pixel_id
parameters.description: The pixel ID that you'd like to track. You can use this field to track offsite events. It supports the campaign objectives for both Auction ads ( REACH , VIDEO_VIEWS , TRAFFIC , WEB_CONVERSIONS , LEAD_GENERATION , APP_PROMOTION , PRODUCT_SALES , ENGAGEMENT ) and Reach & Frequency ads ( RF_REACH ). For Auction objectives If pixel_id !=0 at the ad group level **and** you want to use pixel to track offsite events, then the pixel ID you pass in the tracking_pixel_id field must be the same ID that you specified in the pixel_id field for the ad group. Otherwise, you can pass in any pixel ID that you'd like to track in the tracking_pixel_id field. For Reach & Frequency objectives You can pass in any pixel ID that you'd like to track in the tracking_pixel_id field.

parameters.name: tracking_app_id
parameters.description: The ID of the application that you want to track. You can use this field to track offsite app events. This field supports the campaign objectives for both Auction ads ( REACH , VIDEO_VIEWS , TRAFFIC , WEB_CONVERSIONS , LEAD_GENERATION , APP_PROMOTION , PRODUCT_SALES , ENGAGEMENT ) and Reach & Frequency ads ( RF_REACH ). If app_id is specified at the ad group level and you want to track offsite app events, then the application ID you pass via this field must be the same ID that you specified at the ad group level. Otherwise, you can pass in any application ID that you'd like to track via this field. You can get application ID ( app_id ) via /app/list/ .

parameters.name: tracking_offline_event_set_ids
parameters.description: A list of Offline Event set IDs that you want to track. You can use this field to track and measure offline activity from people that see or interact with your ads. Max size: 50. See here to learn more about how to create and manage Offline Event sets. Note : Existing auto-tracking Offline Event sets have to be tracked under a newly created ad: You can omit this parameter, then this field will automatically default to the IDs of all the existing auto-tracking Offline Event sets under the advertiser account, or You can manually pass in this parameter. You need to specify via this field at least all the existing auto-tracking Offline Event set IDs, and non-auto-tracking ones are optional. To get the IDs of current auto-tracking Offline Event sets, call /offline/get/ to get all Offline Event set IDs and then select all the auto-tracking ones according to the returned auto_tracking parameter. An Offline Event set that has been changed from an auto-tracking one into a non-auto-tracking one, or has been deleted, is not regarded as one of the current auto-tracking Offline Event sets. This field supports the following campaign objectives: REACH , VIDEO_VIEWS , TRAFFIC , LEAD_GENERATION , APP_PROMOTION , WEB_CONVERSIONS , ENGAGEMENT , and PRODUCT_SALES . If the campaign objective ( objective_type ) is set to PRODUCT_SALES , you can only use this field in Video Shopping Ads with product source as catalog. Therefore, ensure the following requirements are both met at the ad group level: shopping_ads_type = VIDEO product_source = CATALOG

parameters.name: vast_moat_enabled
parameters.description: Whether Moat Viewability Verification is enabled for the ad. Default: false . TikTok has partnered with Moat to launch viewability measurement for Brand Auction and Reach & Frequency In-feed ads purchased on TikTok for Business. Note : If you want to enable Moat Viewability Measurement for the ad, we recommend setting viewability_postbid_partner to MOAT instead of using vast_moat_enabled .

parameters.name: viewability_postbid_partner
parameters.description: Post-bid third-party viewability measurement partner. Enum values: MOAT , DOUBLE_VERIFY , IAS . You can only update this field for the created ad before the the ad passes the review and becomes active. Note : Post-bid third-party viewability measurement is currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative. See Brand safety to learn about the supported advertising objectives, supported markets, and the general introduction of post-bid measurement. When you pass in both brand_safety_postbid_partner and viewability_postbid_partner : If you set either of these two fields as IAS , you need to specify both as IAS , and assign the same value (the wrapped VAST URL that you obtain from the measurement partner IAS) to brand_safety_vast_url and viewability_vast_url . If you set two different post-bid measurement partners, only the post-bid brand safety measurement setting will become valid. Post-bid third-party measurement is not supported for ACO ads. Post-bid third-party measurement is not supported for ad groups where promotion_type is set as LIVE_SHOPPING .

parameters.name: viewability_vast_url Conditional
parameters.description: The wrapped VAST URL used by the post-bid third-party partner to measure viewability. Required when viewability_postbid_partner = IAS . You need to get the URL from the measurement partner IAS. You can only update this field for the created ad before the the ad passes the review and becomes active. Note : Post-bid third-party viewability measurement is currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative. When you set both brand_safety_postbid_partner and viewability_postbid_partner as IAS, brand_safety_vast_url should be the same as viewability_vast_url . Post-bid third-party measurement is not supported for ACO ads. Post-bid third-party measurement is not supported for ad groups where promotion_type is set as LIVE_SHOPPING .

parameters.name: brand_safety_postbid_partner
parameters.description: Post-bid third-party brand safety measurement partner. Enum values: DOUBLE_VERIFY , IAS , ZEFR . You can only update this field for the created ad before the the ad passes the review and becomes active. Note : Post-bid third-party brand safety measurement is currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative. See Brand safety to learn about the supported advertising objectives, supported markets, and the general introduction of post-bid measurement. The pre-bid Brand Safety filtering setting at the ad group level will determine whether you can use both types of post-bid measurement: If you have specified brand_safety_type as NO_BRAND_SAFETY at the ad group level, you can only pass in viewability_postbid_partner , but not brand_safety_postbid_partner at the ad level. If you have specified brand_safety_type as a value other than NO_BRAND_SAFETY at the ad group level, you can pass in both viewability_postbid_partner and brand_safety_postbid_partner at the ad level. When you pass in both brand_safety_postbid_partner and viewability_postbid_partner : If you set either of these two fields as IAS , you need to specify both as IAS , and assign the same value (the wrapped VAST URL that you obtain from the measurement partner IAS) to brand_safety_vast_url and viewability_vast_url . If you set two different post-bid measurement partners, only the post-bid brand safety measurement setting will become valid. Post-bid third-party measurement is not supported for ACO ads. Post-bid third-party measurement is not supported for ad groups where promotion_type is set as LIVE_SHOPPING .

parameters.name: brand_safety_vast_url Conditional
parameters.description: The wrapped VAST URL used by the post-bid third-party partner to measure brand safety. Required when brand_safety_postbid_partner = IAS . You need to get the URL from the measurement partner IAS. You can only update this field for the created ad before the the ad passes the review and becomes active. Note : Post-bid third-party brand safety measurement is currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative. When you set both brand_safety_postbid_partner and viewability_postbid_partner as IAS, brand_safety_vast_url should be the same as viewability_vast_url . Post-bid third-party measurement is not supported for ACO ads. Post-bid third-party measurement is not supported for ad groups where promotion_type is set as LIVE_SHOPPING .

parameters.name: impression_tracking_url
parameters.description: Default Impression Tracking URL. URL generated by your data partner to track impression events in your ads. Generally you can find and copy the URL from their platform. If the partner ID for the App ( app_id specified at the ad group level ) that you want to track is 44 (TikTok Business SDK) or 49 (TikTok App API), you don't need to pass in this field. If you do, this field will be ignored. You can obtain the partner ID of an App through partner_id returned from /app/list/ or /app/info/ . If self-attribution has been enabled for the App ( app_id specified at the ad group level ) that you want to track and the partner ID for the App is not 44 (TikTok Business SDK) or 49 (TikTok App API), you don't need to pass in this field because this field will default to the Default Impression Tracking URL you have configured for the App, and updates to the URL are not supported. You can check whether self-attribution has been enabled for the App through self_attribution_enabled returned from /app/list/ or /app/info/ .

parameters.name: click_tracking_url
parameters.description: Click Tracking URL. URL generated by your data partner to track click events in your ads. Generally you can find and copy the URL from their platform. If the partner ID for the App ( app_id specified at the ad group level ) that you want to track is 44 (TikTok Business SDK) or 49 (TikTok App API), you don't need to pass in this field. If you do, this field will be ignored. You can obtain the partner ID of an App through partner_id returned from /app/list/ or /app/info/ . If self-attribution has been enabled for the App ( app_id specified at the ad group level ) that you want to track and the partner ID for the App is not 44 (TikTok Business SDK) or 49 (TikTok App API), you don't need to pass in this field because this field will default to the Click Tracking URL you have configured for the App, and updates to the URL are not supported. You can check whether self-attribution has been enabled for the App through self_attribution_enabled returned from /app/list/ or /app/info/ . Currently Pangle does not support DCM, Sizmek or Flashtalking.

parameters.name: video_view_tracking_url
parameters.description: The monitoring URL for video view.

parameters.name: playable_url
parameters.description: Playable material url, valid in Pangle and TikTok placement. You can get the url via the /playable/get/ endpoint. Note that all ads in the same ad group share the same playable material. Note : Starting September 30, 2024, you will no longer be able to update Playable Ads delivered to the TikTok placement.

parameters.name: creative_type Conditional
parameters.description: Creative type for Live Shopping Ads, Product Shopping Ads, App Pre-Registration, Automotive Ads for Inventory, or Automotive Ads for Models scenarios. When shopping_ads_type is LIVE at the ad group level, this field is required and can be set to SHORT_VIDEO_LIVE or DIRECT_LIVE . When shopping_ads_type is PRODUCT_SHOPPING_ADS at the ad group level, you can omit this field or set it to PSA . When app_promotion_type is APP_PREREGISTRATION at the campaign level and promotion_website_type is set to TIKTOK_NATIVE_PAGE at the ad group level, you can omit this field or set it to CUSTOM_INSTANT_PAGE . When objective_type is LEAD_GENERATION and catalog_enabled is true at the campaign level, you can omit this field or set it to AUTO_INVENTORY_INSTANT_PAGE . To learn about Automotive Ads for Inventory and Automotive Ads for Models, see Create Automotive Ads for Inventory and Automotive Ads for Models . Enum values: SHORT_VIDEO_LIVE : Short videos that direct traffic to live shopping room. DIRECT_LIVE : Live shopping room. Each campaign can have only one live shopping room. PSA : The product visuals will be used as ad creative. CUSTOM_INSTANT_PAGE : Customized TikTok Instant Page. AUTO_INVENTORY_INSTANT_PAGE A video or carousel with an auto-generated Instant Product Page showcasing the inventory of the Auto-Inventory catalog in Automotive Ads for Inventory or the models of the Auto-Model Catalog in the Automotive Ads for Models.

parameters.name: app_name Conditional
parameters.description: App name that is displayed in the ad. If not specified, the name in the app store will be used. Number of characters allowed: 1-40. If the name in the app store exceeds 40 characters, you must pass in a new app name with this field.

parameters.name: display_name Conditional
parameters.description: The display name of landing page or pure exposure ad, length limit: 1-40 English characters, or 1-20 Chinese/Japanese/Korean characters, required when the promotion type is landing page or pure exposure

parameters.name: avatar_icon_web_uri
parameters.description: ID of the avatar image. It can be uploaded through the Upload an image endpoint (picture ratio requirement is 1: 1)

parameters.name: creative_authorized
parameters.description: Whether you grant displaying some of your ads in our TikTok For Business Creative Center. Only valid for non-US advertisers, the default value is false . Note : creative_authorized can only be used for video ads.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: ad_ids
fields.description: Ad IDs.

fields.name: creatives
fields.description: A List of Ads. The returned fields are generated based on the fields specified in the request parameters. If not specified, all fields are returned by default.

fields.name: advertiser_id
fields.description: Advertiser ID.

fields.name: campaign_id
fields.description: Campaign ID.

fields.name: campaign_name
fields.description: Campaign name.

fields.name: adgroup_id
fields.description: Ad group ID.

fields.name: adgroup_name
fields.description: Ad group name.

fields.name: ad_id
fields.description: Ad ID.

fields.name: ad_name
fields.description: Ad name.

fields.name: create_time
fields.description: Time at which the ad was created.

fields.name: modify_time
fields.description: Time at which the ad was modified.

fields.name: identity_id
fields.description: Identity ID.

fields.name: identity_type
fields.description: Identity type. Enum values: CUSTOMIZED_USER , AUTH_CODE , TT_USER , BC_AUTH_TT .

fields.name: identity_authorized_bc_id
fields.description: Returned when identity_type is BC_AUTH_TT . ID of the Business Center that a TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with.

fields.name: catalog_id
fields.description: The catalog you choose for your ads. Note : Starting June 30th, 2024, this field will no longer be returned for newly created Shopping Ads where product_source is STORE at the ad group level because the specified catalog_id will be ignored. Existing Shopping Ads where product_source is STORE will not be affected unless you update them. If you update the existing ads, the existing catalog_id , if present for the ad, will no longer be returned.

fields.name: product_specific_type
fields.description: Different dimensions to choose products. Enum values: ALL : Allow TikTok to dynamically choose from all products. PRODUCT_SET : Specify a product set. TikTok will dynamically choose products from this set. CUSTOMIZED_PRODUCTS : Specify a customized number of products.

fields.name: item_group_ids
fields.description: Product SPU IDs.

fields.name: product_set_id
fields.description: The ID of the product set.

fields.name: sku_ids
fields.description: IDs of the SKUs.

fields.name: vehicle_ids
fields.description: IDs of vehicles.

fields.name: showcase_products
fields.description: The list of Showcase products that you use in your ad.

fields.name: item_group_id
fields.description: SPU ID of the product.

fields.name: store_id
fields.description: The ID of the store that the product ( item_group_id ) belongs to.

fields.name: catalog_id
fields.description: The ID of the catalog that the product ( item_group_id ) belongs to. Note : Starting June 30th, 2024, this field will no longer be returned for newly created Shopping Ads where product_source is STORE at the ad group level because the specified catalog_id within the showcase_products object array will be ignored. Existing Shopping Ads where product_source is STORE will not be affected unless you update them. If you update the existing ads, the existing catalog_id within the showcase_products object array, if present for the ad, will no longer be returned.

fields.name: ad_format
fields.description: The ad format. Enum values: SINGLE_IMAGE , SINGLE_VIDEO , LIVE_CONTENT , CAROUSEL_ADS (non-VSA Carousel Ads), CATALOG_CAROUSEL (VSA Carousel Ads).

fields.name: vertical_video_strategy
fields.description: The video type that you use for Product Sales scenarios. Enum values: UNSET (unset), SINGLE_VIDEO (single video), CATALOG_VIDEOS (catalog video using video templates), CATALOG_UPLOADED_VIDEOS (catalog video using uploaded videos), LIVE_STREAM (livestream video).

fields.name: dynamic_format
fields.description: Dynamic format. Enum values: UNSET : Unset. DYNAMIC_CREATIVE : smart creative. To display different videos, product cards and destinations to each person based on purchase intent, maximizing conversions.

fields.name: video_id
fields.description: The video ID. If the ad is a Spark Ad created by pulling organic videos from linked Business Account, authorized posts, or authorized TikTok accounts in the Business Center, the value of this field will be null. You can get the the ID of a TikTok post via the tiktok_item_id field. To learn more about Spark Ads, see Create Spark Ads .

fields.name: image_ids
fields.description: A list of image IDs.

fields.name: carousel_image_index
fields.description: The index that specifies the additional images to be used in the VSA Carousel ad. The number you set via this field represents the position of the product image within the additional image list ( additional_image_urls ) for each catalog product.

fields.name: end_card_cta
fields.description: Call-to-action for the end card ( image_ids ) of an Automotive Carousel Ad for Inventory or Automotive Carousel Ad for Models . Enum values: SEARCH_INVENTORY (Recommended): Search inventory. LEARN_MORE : Learn more. SHOP_NOW : Shop now. SIGN_UP : Sign up. CONTACT_US : Contact us. BOOK_NOW : Book now. READ_MORE : Read more. VIEW_MORE : View now. ORDER_NOW : Order now.

fields.name: auto_disclaimer_types
fields.description: The type of disclaimer to show in the Automotive Carousel Ads for Models . Enum values: EMISSION : Emssion disclaimer. DISCOUNT : Discount or offer disclaimer.

fields.name: product_display_field_list
fields.description: A list of product details to display in your Automotive Carousel Ad for Inventory . Max size: 2. Enum values: DEALER_NAME : the dealer_name field of vehicles. MAKE : the make field of vehicles. MODEL : the model field of vehicles. YEAR : the year field of vehicles. MILEAGE : the mileage field of vehicles. PRICE : the price field of vehicles. SALE_PRICE : the sale_price field of vehicles. EXTERIOR_COLOR : the exterior_color field of vehicles. TRIM : the trim field of vehicles. ADDRESS_CITY : the city field of vehicles. VEHICLE_STATE : the state_of_vehicle field of vehicles. The title of each vehicle is displayed automatically. For instance, if you set this field to ["MILEAGE","YEAR"] , the ad will display the mileage , price and title fields of each vehicle. To retrieve the product detail fields of your vehicles in an Auto-Inventory catalog and check whether you need to update the details, use /catalog/product/get/ .

fields.name: music_id
fields.description: The ID of the piece of music that is used in the TikTok Carousel Ad.

fields.name: tiktok_item_id
fields.description: The ID of the TikTok post that is used as Spark Ad. To learn more about Spark Ads, see Create Spark Ads .

fields.name: promotional_music_disabled
fields.description: Whether to disable the promotional use of the music in the Spark Ad post. The default value is true . If you want to allow dueting and stitching for the Spark Ad post, you need to set this field to false . This field is only valid for Spark Ad posts.

fields.name: item_duet_status
fields.description: Whether to enable dueting for the Spark Ad post. This field is valid only when promotional_music_disabled is set to false . Enum values: ENABLE , DISABLE . This field is only valid for Spark Ad posts.

fields.name: item_stitch_status
fields.description: Whether to enable stitching for the Spark Ad post. This field is valid only when promotional_music_disabled is set to false . Enum values: ENABLE , DISABLE . This field is only valid for Spark Ad posts.

fields.name: dark_post_status
fields.description: Indicates whether the ad is a Spark Ads dark post. Value can be ON or OFF .

fields.name: branded_content_disabled
fields.description: Default is false. If branded_content_disabled is true , you cannot modify dark_post_status .

fields.name: shopping_ads_video_package_id
fields.description: Catalog video template ID. Returned when the corresponding campaign objective_type is PRODUCT_SALES .

fields.name: ad_text
fields.description: The ad text. It is shown to your audience as part of your ad creative, to deliver the message you intend to communicate to them.

fields.name: ad_texts
fields.description: A list of ad texts.

fields.name: call_to_action
fields.description: For call-to-action text, see Enumeration - Call-to-action

fields.name: call_to_action_id
fields.description: The ID of the CTA portfolio that you want to use in your ads. A CTA portfolio is a group of auto-optimized CTAs. If both this field and call_to_action are specified, this field will be used, and call_to_action will be ignored. For details about auto-optimized CTAs, see CTA Recommendations - Auto-Optimized CTAs .

fields.name: card_id
fields.description: Creative portfolio ID.

fields.name: landing_page_url
fields.description: Landing page URL.

fields.name: utm_params
fields.description: A list of URL parameters.

fields.name: key
fields.description: The URL parameter.

fields.name: value
fields.description: The value of the URL parameter.

fields.name: page_id
fields.description: Page ID.

fields.name: cpp_url
fields.description: The Custom Product Page (CPP) URL. CPPs are product pages with customized screenshots, promotional text, and app previews that can be used to highlight specific content or features of the promoted app, or reach specific audiences.

fields.name: tiktok_page_category
fields.description: The category of the TikTok pages that you want to promote. Enum values: PROFILE_PAGE : TikTok account profile page. OTHER_TIKTOK_PAGE : Other TikTok pages, including Playlist Page, Hashtag Page, Music Page and Branded Effect Page. TIKTOK_INSTANT_PAGE : Custom TikTok Instant Page.

fields.name: phone_region_code
fields.description: Returned only when promotion_type is set to LEAD_GEN_CLICK_TO_CALL at the ad group level. The region code for the phone number that the audience can click on the ad to call. To learn about how to create a Lead Generation ad with promotion type as phone call, refer to here . Note : Creating a Lead Generation ad with promotion type as phone call is currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative.

fields.name: phone_region_calling_code
fields.description: Returned only when promotion_type is set to LEAD_GEN_CLICK_TO_CALL at the ad group level. The phone number that the audience can click on the ad to call. Note : Creating a Lead Generation ad with promotion type as phone call is currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative.

fields.name: phone_number
fields.description: Returned only when promotion_type is set to LEAD_GEN_CLICK_TO_CALL at the ad group level. The phone number that the audience can click on the ad to call. Note : Creating a Lead Generation ad with promotion type as phone call is currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative.

fields.name: deeplink
fields.description: The specific location where you want your audience to go if they have your app installed.

fields.name: deeplink_type
fields.description: The deeplink type. Enum values: NORMAL : non-deferred deeplink. DEFERRED_DEEPLINK : deferred deeplink.

fields.name: deeplink_format_type
fields.description: The format type of the deeplink. Enum values: UNIVERSAL_OR_APP_LINK : Apples universal link or Android App Link starting with http:// or https:// . SCHEME_LINK : Custom URL scheme, in the format of scheme://resource . For instance, a Custom URL scheme of WhatsApp should follow the format whatsapp://resource . NONE : Not a deeplink.

fields.name: shopping_ads_deeplink_type
fields.description: The source of the deeplink to be used in the Shopping Ads. Enum values: NONE : No deeplink. CUSTOM : Custom deeplink. Use the deeplink you provided in the ad. SHOPPING_ADS : Product deeplink. Use the deeplink you've provided for each product in the catalog.

fields.name: deeplink_utm_params
fields.description: A list of deeplink URL parameters.

fields.name: key
fields.description: The deeplink URL parameter.

fields.name: value
fields.description: The value of the deeplink URL parameter.

fields.name: shopping_ads_fallback_type
fields.description: In the Shopping Ads retargeting scenario, the fallback website type when the deeplink fails to be triggered. Enum values: DEFAULT : Unset. CUSTOM : Custom link. Fall back to the web page link you provide. SHOPPING_ADS : Product link. Fall back to the web page link you've provided for each product in the catalog.

fields.name: fallback_type
fields.description: Fallback Type. If the audience do not have the app installed, you can have them fall back to install the app, or to view a specific web page. Enum values: APP_INSTALL : the App Store or Google Play page for the promoted App that is specified through the app_id field at the ad group level. WEBSITE : the promoted web page that is specified through landing_page_url . UNSET : Unset.

fields.name: dynamic_destination
fields.description: Dynamic destination strategy. Enum values: DLP : Dynamic Landing Page. Displaying different destinations including a custom website or Instant Product Page to each person based on their profile, behavior, and intent to maximize ad conversion. UNSET : Unset.

fields.name: auto_message_id
fields.description: The ID of the automatic message to use in a TikTok Direct Messaging Ad. Currently, the only supported automatic message type is welcome message.

fields.name: aigc_disclosure_type
fields.description: Whether to turn on the AIGC (Artificial Intelligence Generated Content) self-disclosure toggle to indicate the ad contains AI-generated content. After the toggle is turned on, your ad will carry an "Advertiser labeled as Al-generated" label when viewed in full. Enum values: SELF_DISCLOSURE : To turn on the toggle to declare that the ad contains AI-generated content. NOT_DECLARED : To not declare that the ad contains AI-generated content.

fields.name: disclaimer_type
fields.description: Type of disclaimer in the ad. Enum values: TEXT_LINK (clickable disclaimers), TEXT_ONLY (text-only disclaimers).

fields.name: disclaimer_text
fields.description: The text-only disclaimer in the ad.

fields.name: text
fields.description: The disclaimer text.

fields.name: disclaimer_clickable_texts
fields.description: The clickable disclaimer or clickable disclaimers in the ad.

fields.name: text
fields.description: The disclaimer text.

fields.name: url
fields.description: The URL for the clickable disclaimer. When users tap each text, they will be redirected to the URL and see more disclaimer details.

fields.name: tracking_pixel_id
fields.description: The pixel ID that is tracked. You can use this field to track offsite events that do not happen on the TikTok instant page.

fields.name: tracking_app_id
fields.description: The ID of the application that is tracked.

fields.name: tracking_offline_event_set_ids
fields.description: A list of Offline Event set IDs that are tracked.

fields.name: tracking_message_event_set_id
fields.description: The ID of the message event set that is measured in the Instant Messaging Ad.

fields.name: vast_moat_enabled
fields.description: Whether Moat Viewability Verification is enabled for the ad. TikTok has partnered with Moat to launch viewability measurement for Brand Auction and Reach & Frequency In-feed ads purchased on TikTok for Business. Note : If you want to enable Moat Viewability Measurement for the ad, we recommend setting viewability_postbid_partner to MOAT instead of using vast_moat_enabled .

fields.name: viewability_postbid_partner
fields.description: Post-bid third-party viewability measurement partner. Enum values: UNSET , MOAT , DOUBLE_VERIFY , IAS , ZEFR .

fields.name: viewability_vast_url
fields.description: The wrapped VAST URL used by the post-bid third-party partner to measure viewability. The value is null when viewability_postbid_partner is not IAS .

fields.name: brand_safety_postbid_partner
fields.description: Post-bid third-party brand safety measurement partner. Enum values: UNSET  DOUBLE_VERIFY , IAS , ZEFR .

fields.name: brand_safety_vast_url
fields.description: The wrapped VAST URL used by the post-bid third-party partner to measure brand safety. The value is null when brand_safety_postbid_partner is not IAS .

fields.name: impression_tracking_url
fields.description: Default Impression Tracking URL.

fields.name: click_tracking_url
fields.description: Click Tracking URL.

fields.name: playable_url
fields.description: Playable material URL.

fields.name: operation_status
fields.description: Operation status. Enum values: ENABLE : The ad is enabled (in 'ON' status). DISABLE : The ad is disabled (in 'OFF' status). FROZEN : The ad is terminated and cannot be enabled.

fields.name: secondary_status
fields.description: Ad statusSecondary statusSee Enumeration - Secondary Status

fields.name: creative_type
fields.description: Creative type for Live Shopping Ads, Product Shopping Ads, App Pre-Registration, Automotive Ads for Inventory, or Automotive Ads for Models scenarios. Enum values: SHOP_PDP : Shop ads with a single product link. SHOP_PLP : Shop ads with 6-50 product links. SHORT_VIDEO_LIVE : Short videos that direct traffic to live shopping room. DIRECT_LIVE : Live shopping room. Each campaign can have only one live shopping room. PSA : The product visuals will be used as ad creative. CUSTOM_INSTANT_PAGE : Customized TikTok Instant Page. Returned only when app_promotion_type is APP_PREREGISTRATION at the campaign level and promotion_website_type is set to TIKTOK_NATIVE_PAGE at the ad group level. AUTO_INVENTORY_INSTANT_PAGE A video or carousel with an auto-generated Instant Product Page showcasing the inventory of the Auto-Inventory catalog in Automotive Ads for Inventory or the models of the Auto-Model Catalog in the Automotive Ads for Models. Returned only when objective_type is LEAD_GENERATION and catalog_enabled is set to true at the campaign level.

fields.name: app_name
fields.description: The display name of app download ad

fields.name: display_name
fields.description: The display name of landing page or pure exposure ad.

fields.name: profile_image_url
fields.description: Avatar URL.

fields.name: creative_authorized
fields.description: Whether you grant displaying some of your ads in our TikTok For Business Creative Center. Only valid for non-US advertisers, the default value is false . Note : creative_authorized can only be used for video ads.

fields.name: is_aco
fields.description: Whether the ad is an automated ad. Set to true for automated ad and false for non-automated ad.

fields.name: is_new_structure
fields.description: Whether the campaign is a new structure (for the same campaign, the structure of campaign, adgroups and ads are the same).

fields.name: optimization_event
fields.description: Conversion event for the ad group. See Conversion events for more.

fields.name: page_info
fields.description: Pagination information.

fields.name: page
fields.description: Current page number.

fields.name: page_size
fields.description: Paging size.

fields.name: total_number
fields.description: Total number of results.

fields.name: total_page
fields.description: Total pages of results.

example.body:
{
    "code": 0,
    "message": "OK",
    "request_id": "{{request_id}}",
    "data": {
        "ad_ids": [
            "{{ad_id}}"
        ],
        "need_audit": false,
        "creatives": [
            {
                "deeplink_type": "NORMAL",
                "call_to_action_id": null,
                "brand_safety_postbid_partner": "UNSET",
                "creative_type": null,
                "tracking_pixel_id": 0,
                "advertiser_id": "{{advertiser_id}}",
                "viewability_postbid_partner": "UNSET",
                "image_ids": [
                    "{{image_id}}"
                ],
                "app_name": "",
                "profile_image_url": "{{profile_image_url}}",
                "landing_page_url": "{{landing_page_url}}",
                "ad_texts": null,
                "viewability_vast_url": null,
                "identity_id": "{{identity_id}}",
                "click_tracking_url": null,
                "avatar_icon_web_uri": "{{avatar_icon_web_uri}}",
                "optimization_event": null,
                "deeplink": "",
                "is_aco": false,
                "landing_page_urls": null,
                "ad_name": "{{ad_name}}",
                "music_id": null,
                "operation_status": "ENABLE",
                "is_new_structure": true,
                "brand_safety_vast_url": null,
                "create_time": "{{create_time}}",
                "ad_id": "{{ad_id}}",
                "adgroup_name": "{{adgroup_name}}",
                "display_name": "{{display_name}}",
                "impression_tracking_url": null,
                "adgroup_id": "{{adgroup_id}}",
                "identity_type": "CUSTOMIZED_USER",
                "video_id": "{{video_id}}",
                "creative_authorized": false,
                "modify_time": "{{modify_time}}",
                "card_id": null,
                "page_id": null,
                "ad_text": "{{ad_text}}",
                "playable_url": "",
                "call_to_action": "{{call_to_action}}",
                "campaign_id": "{{campaign_id}}",
                "ad_format": "SINGLE_VIDEO",
                "campaign_name": "{{campaign_name}}",
                "vast_moat_enabled": false,
                "fallback_type": "UNSET"
            }
        ]
    }
}
